content: Hi there . I would like to mak a little app which need to send notification with dbus. I have found this crate https://crates.io/crates/zbus . It seems this crate use async for notification. I am a beginner with this. What is the best documentation to read to quickly be proficient witrh this with Rust. I know asynchronous programmation from other languages so I am not a total beginner. I started to read async-std book https://book.async.rs/concepts.html. It seems the backend privilieged by zbus. are there alternatives ? I am a bit lost with this.
I don't know if I am on the best channel to ask for that. Let me know if there is a better channel for this.
In general, the best channel for user questions is usually users.rust-lang.org .
But to answer your question, there are various async frameworks.
async-std is a fine place to start if you're using a crate that defaults to it.
